str2: Instantly, immediately, on the spot. From para and chrema; at the thing itself, i.e. Instantly.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To raise up, set up; I rise from among (the) dead; I arise, appear. From ana and histemi; to stand up.
Neuter of a compound of en and a derivative of optanomai; in the face of.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To raise, lift up, take away, remove.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From kata and keimai; to lie down, i.e. be sick; specially, to recline at a meal.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From apo and erchomai; to go off, aside or behind, literally or figuratively.
A dwelling; by implication, a family.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To glorify, honor, bestow glory on. From doxa; to render glorious.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
